LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.0.label: no junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.0.description: It has been too long since I’ve seen junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.1.label: few pieces of ancient junk (1 nearby)
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.1.description: This area is way too sparse, I miss seeing the junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.2.label: few pieces of ancient junk (2 nearby)
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.2.description: This area has very few relics of ancient technology.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.3.label: few pieces of ancient junk (3 nearby)
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.3.description: We need to gather more pieces of ancient junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.4.label: few pieces of ancient junk (4 nearby)
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.4.description: We have too few pieces of ancient junk lying around.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.5.label: very little junk (5 nearby)
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.5.description: We should gather at least a few more pieces. Our junkyard is lacking.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.6.label: small junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.6.description: I recently saw a small pile of junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.7.label: saw junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.8.label: amazing junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.9.label: beautiful junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.9.description: I am surrounded by a junkyard and I love it.
